product_name: Mountain Hardwear Down Flip 35/50 Sleeping Bag - Regular - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stay warm in a range of conditions with the Mountain Hardwear Down Flip 35/50 Sleeping Bag. It has more down fill on 1 side than the other, so you can flip it according to the temperature. Q.Shield(TM) DOWN 600-fill down has an advanced treatment applied that resists heat-robbing moisture and retains maximum loft in damp conditions. Flip the bag from one side to the other to change temperature rating; rated to keep you warm down to about 35degF on 1 side and 50degF on the other. Bag has a roomy and versatile semi-rectangular cut. 5 in. baffle spacing keeps down carefully controlled for even, predictable loft. Dual slider zipper extends around footbox allowing the bag to be opened up and used as a comforter; 2 bags can be zipped together. Insulated draft tube with anti-snag panel prevents cold spots along zipper. Single-handed drawcords easily adjust hood closure. Chest pocket with rip-and-stick closure provides storage for small items. Mountain Hardwear Down Flip 35/50 Sleeping Bag includes a stuff sack and mesh storage bag. Closeout.
